definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

sentences.english: To design a loudspeaker cross-over network by using an electronic computer is a new moron.
sentences.chinese: 采用计算机设计扬声器分频网络是一种新的设计手段。

sentences.english: Through spotlights cost reducing and frequency division utilization it improves system efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 通过聚光降低成本，通过分频综合利用提高系统效率。

sentences.english: The effects of the additive noise on the ILD are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 讨论了输入附加噪声对注锁分频器特性的影响。

sentences.english: Along with the T65, the clock divider is required in order for anything to work with the NES.
sentences.chinese: 利用T65任天国体系中需要时钟分频本领劳动。

sentences.english: Can change the process of division ratio.
sentences.chinese: 可以改变程序中的分频比。

sentences.english: The method has been successfully employed in computer simulation for the fractional frequency transmission system.
sentences.chinese: 该方法已成功地应用于分频输电系统的模拟仿真计算。

sentences.english: Finally, a brief introduction to the applications of the very high speed frequency divider is given.
sentences.chinese: 最后简单介绍了超高速分频器的应用情况。

sentences.english: This article introduces the reader to the electronic frequency divider of the two - principles calculation and production.
sentences.chinese: 本文向读者介绍电子分频器二分频的原理计算和制作。

sentences.english: This paper describes a noise analysis method for a phase switching frequency divider.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种相位开关型分频器电路的噪声分析方法。

sentences.english: A fractional-N frequency synthesizer with novel dividers is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种采用新型分频器的小数分频频率合成器。

sentences.english: A fractional-N frequency synthesizer with novel dividers is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种采用新型分频器的小数分频频率合成器。

sentences.english: The technology of frequency division phase-locked frequency synthesis is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍分频锁相频率合成技术。

sentences.english: A high frequency low power divide-by-2 Injection-Locked Frequency Divider is presented.
sentences.chinese: 设计了一个高频低功耗的注入锁定二分频器。

sentences.english: A phase-switching dual modulus prescaler having a dual modulus divider is provided.
sentences.chinese: 提供一种具有双模分频器的相位切换双模除频器。

sentences.english: In this paper, a wide range programmable divider based on dual-modulus prescaler is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 设计了一种基于双模预分频的宽范围可编程分频器。

definition: filtering radio waves (i.e. to pick out one frequency)
